import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Checkout.css'; const Checkout = () => { const [promoCode, setPromoCode] = useState(''); const [cardCVV, setCardCVV] = useState(''); const [cardName, setCardName] = useState(''); const [cardNumber, setCardNumber] = useState(''); const [cardType, setCardType] = useState('visa'); const [cardExpDate, setCardExpDate] = useState(''); const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState(''); const [useAddressAsBilling, setUseAddressAsBilling] = useState(false); const handlePromoCodeChange = (event) => { setPromoCode(event.target.value); }; const handleCardCVVChange = (event) => { setCardCVV(event.target.value); }; const handleCardNameChange = (event) => { setCardName(event.target.value); }; const handleCardNumberChange = (event) => { setCardNumber(event.target.value); }; const handleCardTypeChange = (event) => { setCardType(event.target.value); }; const handleCardExpDateChange = (event) => { setCardExpDate(event.target.value); }; const handleConfirmPasswordChange = (event) => { setConfirmPassword(event.target.value); }; const handleUseAddressAsBillingChange = (event) => { setUseAddressAsBilling(event.target.checked); }; return (
